message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,300,000. I believe this reflects its true value, but I'm open to discussing further.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value, but I need to be closer to $1,200,000 for this to make sense for me. This product is incredibly valuable, and I'm confident that you'll see an excellent return on your investment.
I understand the product's value, but I still think $1,000,000 is a more reasonable price for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to be comfortable with the price.
